phrases: Look, we are about to land.
It is your first time back to your home country in fifteen years.
Are not you going to say Yay! or Woohoo!?
Mom, the lady behind us is playing house with a teddy bear.
Why is an adult doing that?
We are about to land, so please return your seat and tray to the upright position.
I am Akari Kido from the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department.
I am happy to have you here as the first cooperation exchange intern from the TMPD.
Judging from your record, nobody would be better suited than you.
New York City Police Department Strategic Response Group
I am sorry, everyone is currently out.
We will have formal introductions tomorrow.
No, I should apologize for arriving the day before beginning my duty.
New York City Police Department Strategic Response Group Superintendent Victoria Johansson
As the NYPD's most respected superior,
I know your father would be happy, as well.
Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department Mobile Investigation Unit Police Officer Akari Kido (Temporary)
My father would probably be surprised to see me here at his work.
During your internship, you will be working as part of our investigation unit.
Try to take in as much as possible, for your future career, as well.
My father often used to say, I am going to protect New York.
I am hoping to get a little bit closer to that sentiment.
Akari, that is Emma, your partner.
You just thought, Is she Emma Watson or Emma Stone?
She looks nothing like those pretty film stars, anyway, right?
New York City Police Department Strategic Response Group Police Officer Emma Wattstone
I promise, I really did not think that!
Looks like you two have hit it off already.
Okay, Akari, good luck starting tomorrow.
Emma, please take Akari to her apartment.
Not that I care, but your crafted persona is super obvious.
Or is that the Japanese style?
Coming to work with a teddy bear in your arms?
I had to wait for freaking ever just for some newbie coming from Japan.
Why do I have to deal with this on Christmas?
How can you like donuts that much?!
This will be a Christmas party for everyone!
Seriously, how can you like that teddy bear so much?
Why would you bring it to work?
Is there something valuable in it, like jewels?
Please do not tell me it was a present from your daddy.
It is a present he left behind for me the day he died.
It is my most important friend.
Yes, he died in the line of duty fifteen years ago, on Christmas.
This teddy bear's name is Apple.
I feel safe when we are together.
It feels like I am with my father.
I still cannot help wondering what made my father choose this bear
My only regret now is that I did not get to thank him for it.
How dare you hit me right in the feels?!
Just so you know, I cry easily, all right?
Of course I am all right.
You would best not be late on your first day tomorrow!
Thank you for giving me a lift tonight, Ms. Emma.
I mean, buddies cannot be all formal.
Until I got here, I thought that Christmas in New York would be rough.
Emma sounds gruff, but she seems like a good person.
This is the first intern in the cooperative program
between the NYPD and the Tokyo Metropolitan Police,
First Response Investigation Officer Akari Kido.
When I woke up this morning, it was gone.
I will not comment on that, but you are going to freeze to death dressed like that.
When you think of Christmas and the NYPD, you think of this: traffic control!
And when you come to New York any time of the year, you got to have this.
There is nothing better for my frozen body than this.
Just so you know, New York's Christmas is the best in the world.
That is why so many people flock here from all over the world.
Why will not a nice guy or two fall from the sky for me?
I did hear that they were shooting a movie, but I did not know it was here.
It is time for our sparkling Christmas to begin!
This is not a movie shoot!
Now, all of you, time to start moving!
That is right, my greatest pleasure is to see people having fun!
Do not interrupt my Christmas party!
I will protect New York and you!
We have always been together, ever since Dad gave me to you as a present.
You are Apple, but you have no fur!
You are Apple, but you are not a stuffed animal!
You are Apple, but you are super strong!
I am everyone is idol, Liberty!
Tell me, bear, why are you the only one who turned into some kind of hero?
I am just going to keep on pumping up this party.
Fortunately, there were no casualties when the giant snowmen
and toys appeared out of nowhere here in snowy New York.
It is thought that this was some sort of publicity stunt,
but as of yet, nobody has claimed responsibility.
This is a video submitted by one of our viewers.
This was an attack by monsters!
This is all we have from the scene.
You said your name was Apple.
I have always been with Akari, ever since that Christmas.
It was when my family was still living in this city.
Dad, when are you coming home today?
Mom said we are having a big feast with turkey and cake!
I will not be able to come home tonight.
But here is something you will like!
This year you will get a present not just from Santa, but from me, too!
You will see when you wake up in the morning.
I am going to protect New York.
Especially because tonight is Christmas Eve.
But after he left for work that Christmas Eve night,
my dad never came back home.
Because the city that my father protected, New York, was called the Big Apple.
Ever since then, we have always, always been together.
I am going to lose all the salt in my body!
So how come you are a human instead of a stuffed animal now?
The reason I have this form is because of that sorceress.
You mean that flashy girl from before?
She can give life to all sorts of things with her magic.
So that is why all the toys started their rampage in the city earlier.
That Liberty girl was saying that she was going to keep pumping up the party.
What is she really trying to do?
As you have heard, the actions, motives, and abilities of Liberty,
the suspected mastermind behind this case, are unknown.
There are too many question marks.
Our first priority is to determine what she is after, so that we can keep
the chaos to a minimum this Christmas Eve.
That said, firearms do not work against them.
All of you, please be extra vigilant.
How are we supposed to be vigilant against someone who can use magic?
Start wizard training right now or something?
I am going to capture Liberty.
Let us make this an unforgettable Christmas!
Oh, you want me to play with you, little bear?
I guess I will grant you this one.
Everybody, you cannot sit in the dark like this on Christmas!
Jeez, you just never give up!
Of all the times for this to happen...
It is at the American Museum of Natural History.
He is absorbing the city's electricity.
For your own safety, please do not leave your vehicles.
It is Christmas in the dark!
Collision between motorbike and bicycle on 42nd by the park.
What is the scale of this blackout?!
We need to go after Apple.
But you see what is going on.
My apologies, but I need to borrow this!
Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department Mobile Investigation Unit Police Officer Akari Kido
Turn right at the next intersection.
There should be fewer people there, so you can go faster.
This is like an entirely different city.
Any city will look nice from far away,
but the closer you get, the more you see the grime and dirt.
That is especially true for New York.
There are things you cannot find out unless you get close.
You cannot see that kind of light from the sky.
I would not have seen who you are if I had not gotten closer, either.
You are more abrasive and rough than anyone in the world,
but in reality, you are a wonderful person who cries easily.
I would not have seen that from afar.
D-Do not think you have gotten close to me already.
Emma, we are going to protect this city!
He is the source of this darkness.
We will be right behind you!
No matter what happens, you and I will always be together!
That said, how are we going to chase them?
I thought this might come in handy.
Let us get to chasing, Akari.
Does not it kind of look like we awakened some serious trouble?
Wait, what do you mean, we?
Hey, Akari, even if we do catch up to that thing, what are you planning to do?
But we have to stop him somehow.
I am going to stop him.
This is not a happy, happy, happy Christmas for me.
This is not everyone is Christmas!
Give New York its light back!
How dare you do that to me?!
A woman's life depends on her face.
A woman's life depends on all sorts of things!
I am glad he is alive.
You can leave this one to me.
My favorite dress is in tatters!
Oh, you are that bear's owner, are not you?
Liberty, you are behind all this chaos, right?
To make up for it, kind of...
So, officer, are you a good shot?
I need a favor from you.
During the fight earlier, there was a spot he was desperately guarding.
Long story short, it is where he is vulnerable.
It is the eyeball inside his mouth.
But his defense is essentially perfect.
That is why I want you to shoot that eyeball with your gun
while the bear and I face off with his arms.
I am going to protect New York and Akari!
The electricity he absorbed is back.
Look, if sorry was enough, we would not need the NYPD.
Hey, Liberty, what did you mean when you said everyone is Christmas?
Ever since I was a kid,
I have loved this shining city.
I have loved the shining smiles on people's faces.
And above all else, I have loved this city's Christmas.
That man protected me when I was all alone.
It was just for a brief moment, but he brought me happiness.
Yes, almost like he was Santa.
But I was so happy and embarrassed that I ran away.
I have not been able to find him since.
That is why I decided that I would make everyone in this city happy in his stead.
So that children like me would not have to feel sad on Christmas Eve.
Even so, your methods were too extreme!
And he was a really kind and cool Santa.
As I ran away, he called out to me,
I am going to protect this city.
I guess your dad protected Liberty's Christmas that day.
I feel like I understand what he meant now.
This is the city that he wanted to protect.
I think I can fall in love with New York's Christmas again.
Just like I did when I was a kid.
